title: Netflix Grows Even With Higher Prices, Goldman Sachs Earnings Analysis, Zombie Malls
itunes:title: Netflix Grows Even With Higher Prices, Goldman Sachs Earnings Analysis, Zombie Malls
description:
Masters in Business Host Barry Ritholtz joins Carol and they speak to Geetha Ranganathan, Bloomberg Intelligence Tech & Media Analyst, and Chris Palmeri, Bloomberg L.A. Bureau Chief, on Netflix adding subscribers despite raising prices. Gerard Cassidy, Head of U.S. Bank Equity Strategy at RBC, breaks down earnings from Goldman Sachs. Sam Dunlap, Senior Portfolio Manager at Angel Oak Capital, discusses housing data and investing in real estate backed assets. Noah Buhayar, Bloomberg News Finance Reporter, explains how retail is affected by "attack of the zombie malls." We Drive to the Close with David Rosenberg, Chief Economist & Strategist at Gluskin Sheff. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
